name: Shiboleth
headline: Shiboleth automates lending compliance for financial institutionsÃ¢Â€Â¦
description:
Shiboleth automates consumer lending compliance for financial institutions using AI.
Banks like Cross River Bank use us to save months of manual work by automating audits and drafting reports for the governments. 

LLMs allow whole categories of manual compliance processes to be automated in ways that werenÃ¢Â€Â™t possible until recently.

We are excited to automate back-office operations and enhance consumer protection in one of the most litigious industries.
tags: industry:fintech; industry:generative-ai; industry:b2b; industry:compliance; industry:lending; location:new-york

founders.name: Esty Scheiner, Founder
founders.description:
Esty Scheiner is the CEO and Co-founder of Shiboleth. Shiboleth automates regulatory compliance for lending institutions

Before Shiboleth, Esty was a Security Engineer at Invoca, developing an LLM tool for automating security compliance. She dropped out of NYU CS at 19 yr. old to become a SE at Buggy, quickly rising to manage a 6-person R&D team within a year . Additionally she is a self taught CISSP and OSCP (top compliance and hacking certs) in months instead of 5 years.

founders.name: Bivu Dhungana, Founder
founders.description:
Bivu is a co-founder and CTO at shiboleth.ai which he founded with Esty Scheiner in late 2023.  Shiboleth automates regulatory compliance for lending institutions. 

Bivu has a decade of experience working as a ML Engineer in logistics, banking and audio. Before Shiboleth, Bivu worked at Pindrop as an AI Engineer where he led a team for IVR fraud detection. His team's product is used by 6 of the largest 10 banks, and amounted to $10 million ARR in sales.

generated_description:
### Shiboleth: Automating Compliance in Financial Lending

**Overview:**
Founded in 2023 and based in New York, Shiboleth is a cutting-edge startup in the fintech space, proudly participating in Y Combinatorâ€™s Batch W24. With a lean team of just two employees and guided by Group Partner Diana Hu, Shiboleth aims to revolutionize compliance processes within the consumer lending sector.

**Mission:**
Shiboleth focuses on automating lending compliance for financial institutions through the power of artificial intelligence. This innovation allows banks, like Cross River Bank, to cut down on months of tedious manual work associated with audits and government reporting. At a time when regulatory demands are high, Shibolethâ€™s solution presents a significant opportunity for efficiency and accuracy.

**What They Do:**
By leveraging advanced Large Language Models (LLMs), Shiboleth automates numerous compliance processes that were previously labor-intensive. This includes aspects of back-office operations that not only enhance productivity but also bolster consumer protection in an industry known for its complexity and potential for litigation.

**Core Features:**
- **Complaint Management:** Effectively screen and escalate significant complaints.
- **Call Monitoring:** Utilize live transcriptions and summaries to manage customer interactions.
- **Issue Management:** Coordinate responses and mitigate risks across various stakeholders.
- **Marketing Review:** Develop custom scorecards to identify problematic marketing materials.
- **Reg E Testing and OFAC Geofencing:** Analyze dispute data and verify regulatory compliance with geographical restrictions.

**Security:**
Security is paramount; Shiboleth is deployed on AWS Bedrock, ensuring that financial institutionsâ€™ data is protected under the highest standards.

**Why It Matters:**
In a world where compliance is increasingly complex and critical, Shiboleth empowers financial institutions to transition from manual to automated processes. This shift not only saves time and resources but also strengthens governance in a highly regulated industry.

**Conclusion:**
Shiboleth represents a smart leap forward for fintech, integrating technology into complianceâ€”a space ripe for disruption. As they continue to evolve, Shiboleth could very well become the go-to partner for banks looking to navigate the murky waters of regulatory compliance with ease.

For more information, check out their website: [Shiboleth](https://www.shiboleth.ai/).
